summary.div: Note This structure is used by the and functions, which are provided only for backward compatibility.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.List
member.summary: A linked list of LIST_ENTRY structures.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedSize
member.summary: The size of the memory allocated for theIMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION structure and all debugging information, in bytes.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedMappedBase
member.summary: The base address of the image.

summary.para: The computer type. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
Intel (32-bit)
Intel Itanium
x64 (AMD64 or EM64T)

summary.para: The characteristics of the image. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
Relocation information is stripped from the file.
The file is executable (there are no unresolved external references).
Line numbers are stripped from the file.
Local symbols are stripped from file.
Aggressively trim the working set.
The application can handle addresses larger than 2 GB.
Bytes of the word are reversed.
Computer supports 32-bit words.
Debugging information is stored separately in a .dbg file.
If the image is on removable media, copy and run from the swap file.
If the image is on the network, copy and run from the swap file.
System file.
DLL file.
File should be run only on a uniprocessor computer.
Bytes of the word are reversed.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedCheckSum
member.summary: The checksum of the image.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ImageBase
member.summary: The requested base address of the image.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.SizeOfImage
member.summary: The size of the image, in bytes.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedNumberOfSections
member.summary: The number of COFF section headers.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedSections
member.summary: A pointer to the first COFF section header. For more information, see.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedExportedNamesSize
member.summary: The size of the ExportedNames member, in bytes.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedExportedNames
member.summary: A pointer to a series of null-terminated strings that name all the functions exported from the image.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedNumberOfFunctionTableEntries
member.summary: The number of entries contained in the FunctionTableEntries member.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedFunctionTableEntries
member.summary: A pointer to the first function table entry. For more information, see.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedLowestFunctionStartingAddress
member.summary: The lowest function table starting address.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedHighestFunctionEndingAddress
member.summary: The highest function table ending address.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedNumberOfFpoTableEntries
member.summary: The number of entries contained in the FpoTableEntries member.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedFpoTableEntries
member.summary: A pointer to the first FPO entry. For more information, see.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.SizeOfCoffSymbols
member.summary: The size of the COFF symbol table, in bytes.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.CoffSymbols
member.summary: A pointer to the COFF symbol table.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedSizeOfCodeViewSymbols
member.summary: The size of the CodeView symbol table, in bytes.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedCodeViewSymbols
member.summary: A pointer to the beginning of the CodeView symbol table.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ImageFilePath
member.summary: The relative path to the image file name.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ImageFileName
member.summary: The image file name.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedDebugFilePath
member.summary: The full path to the symbol file.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedTimeDateStamp
member.summary: The timestamp of the image. This represents the date and time the image was created by the linker.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedRomImage
member.summary: This value is TRUE if the image is a ROM image.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedDebugDirectory
member.summary: A pointer to the first debug directory. For more information, see.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedNumberOfDebugDirectories
member.summary: The number of entries contained in the DebugDirectory member.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.ReservedOriginalFunctionTableBaseAddress
member.summary: The original function table base address.

member.name: IMAGE_DEBUG_INFORMATION.Reserved
member.summary: This member is reserved for use by the operating system.
